org.gradle.api.changedetection.digest
Interface DigesterUtil

public interface DigesterUtil

Utility class to calculate the digest of a file or directory based on a requested strategy.

Method Summary
 void digestDirectory(java.security.MessageDigest digester, java.io.File directory, long directorySize)
          Updated the digester for a directory based on the requested strategy.

          Updates the digester for a file based an the requested strategy.
 

Method Detail

digestFile

void digestFile(java.security.MessageDigest digester,
                java.io.File file)
Updates the digester for a file based an the requested strategy.

Parameters:
digester - The digester to update.
file - The file that needs it's digest calculated.

digestDirectory

void digestDirectory(java.security.MessageDigest digester,
                     java.io.File directory,
                     long directorySize)
Updated the digester for a directory based on the requested strategy.

Parameters:
digester - The digester to update.
directory - The directory that needs it's digest calculated.
directorySize - The size of the directory to use for digest calculation.
